item.description:
Updates: The movie starts at 5:15 PM and its a 3D show. So request all of you to come by 4:30 PM. Again if anyone running late call Prem in advance and can book you a seat. Prem's number is 980-939-2107


One of our members, Prem, recommended this meetup so I'm posting it. Please note, this is opening weekend for the movie. I normally don't post movies on opening weekend for popular movies because it will be very difficult to get seats together. So PLEASE arrive early for this film. If you're going to be late, please call Prem at 980-939-2107

Dinner afterwards will be at Texas Roadhouse restaurant in the same parking lot as the movie.

Clash of the Titans

Caught amid a war between the gods, Perseus (Sam Worthington), the son of Zeus (Liam Neeson), is helpless to save his family from Hades (Ralph Fiennes), god of the underworld. With nothing left to lose, Perseus leads a band of warriors on a dangerous quest to prevent Hades from overthrowing the king of the gods and laying waste to the Earth.

Cast: Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Mads Mikkelsen, Gemma Arterton, Danny Huston
Director: Louis Leterrier


http://clash-of-the-t...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby by the restaurant
item.name: Clash of the Titans - Movie and Dinner
